alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Cannon; Coffee; De Kalb; Rutherford; Smith; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 2:59PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Smith, De Kalb, Rutherford, central Coffee, southeastern Wilson, central Bedford and Cannon Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 258 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Watertown to near Shelbyville. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Lebanon, Shelbyville, Manchester, Smithville, Woodbury, Watertown, Gordonsville, Walterhill, Hickman, Alexandria, Wartrace, Bell Buckle, Dowelltown, Liberty, Auburntown, Normandy, Beechgrove, Fosterville and Cedars Of Lebanon State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bedford; Cannon; Coffee; De Kalb; Rutherford; Smith; Wilson
